- Add msvcrt support for Windows file locking
- Set default password to "a" in secrets.toml
- Track secrets.toml in git for simplified deployment

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: disable file locking on Windows to prevent pbgui.ini reset issues

- Remove msvcrt file locking on Windows (caused file access problems)
- Keep fcntl file locking on Unix/Linux (works reliably)
- Windows is single-user desktop app, strict locking not needed
- Prevents pbgui.ini from being reset/corrupted on Windows

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
